posts.title: A brief introduction about my Eng teacher,Peter
posts.text: I have learned English at Only Edu for about 10 years, and I have been learning about spoken English with a teacher from ğŸ‡¿ğŸ‡¦ South Africa there for over three years. I have always been concerned that learning spoken English is very important. And it is very lucky that we have foreign English teachers here. Peterâ€™s got an excellent pronunciation, therefore I insist on learning with him since I knew him.Peter is an adventurous person. He is addicted to extreme sports like ğŸ„ğŸ»â€surfing, ğŸ¤¿diving, ğŸ¦ˆspearfishing, etc. He is willing to try something new anytime. He has tasted ğŸ˜elephants, ğŸŠcrocodiles and many kinds of animals which are hard to imagine. Peter is trainging himself to be fitter and his keeping an strict diet.He is a person of strong self-discipline.Peter also pays much attention to teaching. He is always trying to find good materials for me. He is more like a friend than a teacher as I can talk about anything Iâ€™m interested in during classes. This helps me to make progress in expressing myself in English and building up confidence. I am very grateful for his hard-work teaching me. He has encouraged me a lot.
